p: Folin–Ciocâlteu (FC) reagent, 2,2-diphenyl-1-picrylhydrazyl (DPPH), butylatedhydroxyanisole (BHA), gallic acid, rutin, NaNO 2, NaOH, AlCl 3, Tris-HCl buffer, pancreatic lipase, Arabic gum, acetone, olive oil, CH 3OH, free fatty acids (FFA) used were analytical research grade (Sigma-Aldrich, BDH and Merck, Taufkirchen, Germany).
